message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.CC

Reasoning: The paper deals with text categorization and classification, which are common topics in the fields of computational linguistics (cs.CL) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of probabilistic models and SVM classifiers also suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper's use of correlation between sentences and text analysis could also be relevant to the field of computational complexity (cs.CC).
